    • getContainer

      public TypedEntityContainer<T> getContainer(String path, ProgressMonitor monitor)
      Description copied from interface: Container
      Returns a container for a given path. It is a logical operation - the container doesn't have to exist.
      Specified by:
      getContainer in interface Container<T>
      Specified by:
      getContainer in interface TypedEntityContainer<T>
      Overrides:
      getContainer in class MapContainer<TypedEntity<T>>
      Returns:
      Container instance or null if it would not be possible to create such a container, e.g. an element with this path already exists or one of path elements is not a container.
